mutants.code:
def maxScoreSightseeingPair(values):
    max_seen = values[0] - 0
    max_score = float('-inf')
    for i in range(1, len(values)):
        current_score = max_seen + values[i] - i
        max_score = max(max_score, current_score)
        max_seen = max(max_seen, values[i] + i)
    return max_score

    return max_score
